title: Can you request a TV manufacturer to make a 3D TV for you? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can request anything - ask them to send you to the moon. You’ll get the same answer. Trust me, I have the last and greatest 3D TV made and love it, would love to have the ability to get another. You could definitely talk them into it for the right price - would require getting together people that understand it, bringing out machines that have been shut down for manufacturing… it would probably require a few hundred thousand at least to have them custom make something. You’d be better off getting one off eBay - some are unopened and new there too.
